componentInstanceProperties.name: richTextValue
componentInstanceProperties.value:
Hello {{{Recipient.FirstName}}},

Our FLEXcon® dermaFLEX™ product portfolio offers a wide variety of flexible adhesive substrates to meet adhesion level and length of wear requirements. To make product selection easier, our Technical Service Representatives are available to assist with identifying the adhesive that best matches your requirements, providing confidence and peace of mind.

componentInstanceProperties.name: richTextValue
componentInstanceProperties.value:
We’ve done the testing, so you don’t have to!
dermaFLEX™ adhesives have been tested for biocompatibility (skin irritation, sensitization, and cytotoxicity) by FLEXcon’s adhesive suppliers using ISO-10993 or similar test methods.
